name: George VS Bonny PP Wars
description: George VS Bonny PP Wars— a game about the holy war of purity and order against dirt and a disgusting smell.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 (256 MB) or ATI™ Radeon™ X1600 Pro (256 MB) or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes:
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
